abstract: In this post, English Language Learners explore Valentine’s Day traditions and choose the correct word to complete several sentences before expressing what they would tell a special someone in honor of the holiday.

headline.main: E.L.L. Practice + Prompt | Looking Forward to Valentine’s Day
